metadata.abstractText: This paper is concerned with planning in stochastic domains by means of par­ tially observable Markov decision processes (POMDPs). POMDPs are difficult to solve. This paper identifies a subclass of POMDPs called region observable POMDPs, which are easier to solve and can be used to approxi­ mate general POMDPs to arbitrary accuracy.
